subject: Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: Senator John Kerry is no different from the many fans enraged that Extra Innings — a 10-channel service that transmits out-of-market games for $179 a year — will disappear from cable TV homes.
snippet: Senator John Kerry is no different from the many fans enraged that Extra Innings — a 10-channel service that transmits out-of-market games for $179 a year — will disappear from cable TV homes.
